snippet: Several educators frequently mentioned as candidates for New York City schools chancellor once worked under Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, but then criticized his policies.
abstract: Speculation grows on Mayor-Elect Bill de Blasio's choice for New York City's next schools chancellor; de Blasio has remained quiet publicly on his thinking, saying city is 'not going to have a beauty contest.'

byline.original: By JAVIER C. HERNÁNDEZ and AL BAKER

lead_paragraph: Several educators frequently mentioned as candidates for New York City schools chancellor once worked under Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, but then criticized his policies.

headline.main: Speculating on de Blasio’s Choice for Schools Chief
headline.print_headline: Speculating on De Blasio’s Choice for Schools Chief
